headline: Senate candidate hopes “Brandon” helps win GOP voters
author: Dennis Owens
sentences: Republican political strategist Chris Nicholas said that the advertisement won’t likely move the needle, but the unprecedented spending on ads by both McCormick and candidate Mehmet Oz is noteworthy.
